case.state: Y'all want me? But... what're we playin'?
Are ya sure? I... I guess I can do my best...
Would you look at that hair! Y'ain't part sheep, are ya? I swear, the things I've seen in this place...
What in the world? Why do you got a sword? You from the past or somethin'?
Ooh... What a pretty li'l light...
Ain't you the cutest li'l thing! What kinda bird are you?
Well... yeah, sure am. I didn't know I wasn't supposed to talk.
W-wait a sec... what's goin' on here?
There's two o' me? How'd that happen?
Now git outta my wool, you! Ain't no imposters allowed here!
Ain't we just the cutest flock y'ever did see?
We ready to go? Alright! I'm Leggy; how do I play?
Sorry 'bout that; still gettin' used to this place. Call me Leggy, y'hear?
I made sure to wash my hooves 'fore comin' here. That all right?
I don't need nothin' else.
Could ya throw ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ my way?
I... I don't quite know for sure what... c-can I just have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please?
I could use ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, if ya don't mind.
Gimme a hit would ya, dealer?
Could ya throw ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ my way?
I... I don't quite know for sure what... c-can I just have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please?
I could use ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, if ya don't mind.
Gimme a hit would ya, dealer?
Toss t-- no... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ my way, if ya please!
~Cards.text~'ll have to do.
Feels better'n a good brushing!
Ain't that just the best?
Well now ain't that the baddest set of cards y'ever did see!
Now ain't these bitchin'!
I ain't never had nothin' to fear!
Now I know the game, ain't no way I'm losin' this one.
Amazin'! Musta' ate a clover on the way over here!
I'm made in the shade, y'all.
Well, it coulda been better.
Well these ain't the baddest, but they'll do.
These're just fine. Sure I've seen better, but I bet you don't!
Why, I'm sure I can live with it.
Careful now; I can still win with this.
I seen pigs that look better'n this hand. And that's sayin' somethin'!
Right-o; guess I can't complain.
Ain't that just swell.
How excitin'! I might be warmin' up them shears soon.
Hey, ~player~, wanna swap?
Oooh, darn it!
Now that's just low...
I knew I wouldn't be no good at this!
Wait just a dad-burned...
Ain't that a kick in the head?
Y'ain't seen the last of me, ya hear?
Shot down again.
This ain't the sorta' thing what'll razz my berries.
Well this don't look in no ways good...
Now where's that dog when ya need 'im?
How smart, Amalia! How'd you do that? With the flowers? You've got to teach me! Please?
I'm not sure... how do I know if they're good cards?
Cool set. I think. Anyone wanna help a girl out?
My friend Peggy sent me here, said y'all were playin' a fun game tonight. Sure wish she'd explain herself more sometimes...
Don't get any ideas, now; I don't need no swords to cut my wool.
Well... sure, but... nothin' wrong with that, right?
Sure! I ain't to used to games like --
I hope this'll do instead of more clothin'...
I guess you got a point... but if I can make it back home, I'll be just fine.
Oh, I won't be too cold, one way or another. I'll just have to snuggle up close to Barbra.
S-spell? What do you mean? I... I know I didn't do too good with the cards, but...
Oh, y'ain't got no idea darlin'. This wool's like a dream.
Well sure! Peggy makes it sound like lotsa fun!
Cos--... huh? It... it ain't fur, it's wool...
Did I? I don't never feel like I'm in the right place...
Too much what?
Costume? N-no... I'm just a sheep. Ain't you ever seen a sheep before?
Oh, don't worry none about me, darlin'. I think I'm --
I-it ain't like that, y'hear? Peggy's the one what--
Sure am! 100% bona fide--
W-well, they used to be, but then that --
Oh, this dang thing... Peggy called it a garter... said it'd help me --
Well sure... I ain't too used to --
That sounds an awful lot like cheatin'... Naw, hon'. I think I got an idea.
Oh, is that what you call it? Well... don't let me call ya strange!
Close, I guess. I never could wear makeup though.
You've sure got a good point, there, Pit. I ain't got nothin' left but wool...
Oh, don't you worry none, Rin dear. Just givin' y'all what you've earned.
That so, Akko? Well... guess you'll be gettin' more of it in a sec'.
Well shoot, ya ought to be, Futaba! But look at me; has my wool been this way the whole time? At least I don't gotta wear it much longer.
Hang on, now; what'd y'all think I was?
'Course I am! Golly, you could've just asked if you were so curious.
Well, it wouldn't be no fun to just cut it all off. I still wanna win.
Ooh, I been needin' a good brushing... You wouldn't want it like this, Rin darlin'.
Naw, darlin'; this wool's just so easy to muck up. Peggy don't know how lucky she is to have black wool.
Oh, trust me, Akko. You don't gotta tell me twice.
Yeah, Nat, this thing ain't half bad. I'd thank Peggy for lettin' me use it... if she'd let me.
Oh, no, hon'. Peggy found this little dear not long ago. Don't tell her I've got it.
Now just what makes you say that, Sakura?
Y'all want clothin'? This sure is a strange game.
Me first? Well that ain't hardly... oh, all y'all want is clothin'?
This is only my first loss? Y'all about to have a ba-a-a-ad time.
Whaddaya mean, strip again? I'm already outta clothes! Unless...
I don't got nothin' else to take off now, but... maybe I can come up with somethin', huh?
Aww, is it my turn? Well, alright then.
Shoot, I knew I wasn't no good at these kinda things...
Wait, did I... I didn't forget to swap my cards, now did I?
Oh, I don't like this none! I didn't think this place would get to me so bad!
Again? Well... only clothing I've got left is --
Well alright. I guess I'll give up my last --
Well, I don't got no more clothes to give y'all, but...
If it's not just clothes y'all are after... maybe I can...
Ain't like I can take my hooves off, but... maybe...
Shoot, now I'm startin' to... I didn't think y'all could make a shearing so excitin'...
Aww, this wool's filthy... Guess I don't gotta deal with it for much longer...
Well, I sure hope y'all are ready for just a bit more lamb...
I'm not out just yet! Just you wait.
I... I ain't got no magic or nothin'...
I just figured I oughtta keep my hooves to myself.
I don't hardly know what's goin' on no more. Rin, you seein' a ghost or somethin'?
Naw, nothin' like that. Just a sheep.
Ain't no trouble, darlin'. Besides, I ain't ready to leave just yet.
Ain't never heard Peggy call it a "leotard"... but I guess she don't talk about her wool much neither.
Not quite, Nugi dear, but it sure does vibrate. Tickles somethin' fierce!
Good ear, darlin'! What'd ya expect with them shears?
Oh, I'll be lookin' like this... for a while. I been needin' a shearin' though.
Accidents happen all the time, anyhow. Especially with that wolf around.
Well shoot, y'all shoulda' said somethin'!
Is it, Pit? Wonder why nobody's told me before. Ain't like I can move my wool though.
Well I ain't supposed to be easy to beat!
Bet she'd be a lot nicer if she had wool so hard to keep clean. Probably stay outta trouble, too.
Well now ya ask! If you could get my backside, though, that'd be just peachy.
Liberatin'! Yeah, that's a good way to put it!
I hear ya, Nugi, but this right here's a delicate operation, y'know!
Ain't quite bare; these're good shears, but hardly perfect. Ain't no need to get every last bit though.
I oughtta focus on the game some, though. If I don't pay attention I could get tied up in all sorts of ways.
A cos-what? You don't like my wool?
Well I... alright, then. Guess I'll take all the help I can get.
Well I sure got a sheepherder, if that's what you're askin'. Careful, now; Droopy's sneaky enough to be right here with us.
Witch? Huh? What're you talkin' about, dear?
What was that? Somethin' 'bout bein' careful? (Have these shears always been so loud?)
Ya got any better ideas back there?
Sew it on? Now how on Earth would I do that?
Don't you worry none, I'll be ready in no t-- oops! I oughtta focus a minute...
Well... how else do I get rid of this stuff?
Is that alright? Nobody explained the rules...
Akko? You talkin' again? You'll have to speak up, hon'!
I... I guess so. Ain't no one never wanted to do nothin' with this wool. 'Cept gettin' it off me, I guess.
I've heard of it too. You'd think people who count sheep every night would know one when they see it.
Eep! Why's this feel so...?
I don't get this game... sure wish Peggy was here to explain things...
I 'spose I can do without this lil' ol' thing.
I'm glad y'all don't want no more'n this silly thing...
Unh!
Shoot!
I sure hope y'all don't mind if I lose somethin' else instead!
Oops! Cut that one a little close...
Here we go again~!
Ain't no way I'm hurryin' this along; gotta get it just right.
I'll tell ya, it's much nicer shavin' it off than when that darn wolf shows up.
Doggone, y'all ain't ever happy, are ya?
Ooh, darlin'! It's never felt like this!
I'll leave whatever I want, doggone it! I just want somewhere to stay warm.
Ain't a half bad leg a' lamb, huh?
That sounds just dandy, miss Haru!
Sorry, darlin'; it's the only wool I got!
Oh, that! Yep, I sure can talk. That ain't too strange, is it?
All the strange things in this place, I'm not sure why anyone's surprised by li'l old -- music?
I'm alright! Might need a hand here in a minute though...
No harm done! Good as new, promise!
Well the idea ain't to lose, now is it?
I mean, I guess I could; that darn wolf sure pulled off his fair share. But that wouldn't be no fun!
I'm sure we could come to some kinda arrangement... I heard my wool's pretty valuable, y'know.
Thanks, darlin'! Pretty clever, ain't it?
That's so nice of you! I might be needin' that if I keep playin' like this.
Sorry to hear that, darlin'... If it helps at all, I ain't never knew a cat I didn't like.
Chops? Y-you mean my...? W-well... thanks, I guess.
It ain't so important, darlin'. I'll just make sure to take it on back to the farm.
Well of course I ain't! You coulda' just asked. I'm just a sheep, darlin'.
Doggone, it feels good to get that thing off. What's that now, Futaba?
And anyway, I don't mind this game's rules none. Always get tired of wearin' this ol' thing.
Just like that? That was easy!
And y'know wool ain't fur, right? Why people 'round me keep talkin' about fur, I don't know.
I'm alright! Got some paddin' down there anyhow, y'know?
I dunno 'bout agility. Must just be I've done this a few too many times!
I'm alright! This wool's awful... say, that's a keen idea, Natsuki! I ought to try that.
I'm alright! Even if this is the last bit I've got to take off.
I think I'll take that as a compliment, thank you very much!
Y'alright, there, Futaba? I'm sure proud of the idea, but you seem like somethin's gettin' to ya.
Y'alright, Nat? You look spooked somethin' fierce.
What's wrong? Don't that count?
I could think of a couple ways. This sure is the easiest though, lemme tell ya.
W-well... what'd you expect? Do you normally count 'em? Should I have more, Akko?
I guess you were expectin' a cow?
Whew, sometimes it's nice to let 'em breathe, y'know?
Furry? What're you talkin' about? Y'ain't got a lick'a fur on you!
Hey! We aren't pigs, Pit!
You can do that? Like, with your magic? That's amazin'!
'Bout time somebody gets it.
Doggone, Pit! C'mon, now, let me keep some of my wool!
Finally! Look, y'all, it's like I'm beach-ready!
Y'all wanna go for a quick swim? Ain't this how you wear a swimsuit?
If it wasn't for Droopy, I'd have given that wolf what for myself!
Ooh, that feels different. How do I look?
Aww, finally! Ain't no feelin' better'n takin' a collar off, y'know?
Got it! I'm alright!
I'm okay! Silly thing; I don't even know why Peggy told me to wear it.
Glad I realized what y'all meant. I've still got plenty to trim!
Silly ol' me, thinkin' I was already through!
Ah, shoot. I didn't think it'd be so nippy in here.
Well, gosh... I'm gonna need someone to keep me warm now...
There goes the last of it. Careful, now; that wool's pretty valuable y'know!
Well, shoot! I ain't got nothin' else to lose!
I'm gonna be mighty cold for the next month or so, y'know. I hope it was worth it!
C'mon, ~player~, y'ain't gonna pull the wool over my eyes!
~Player~, please... can't ya just give me somethin' nice?
Now I do wonder what you're hidin' under there, big fella~
Please, do show us a fine cut of meat, ~player~.
Don't worry none, y'can't win every game.
My favorite: someone lost and it ain't me!
And the little lamb's safe another round!
Oh, now I wonder what's comin' off now...
Alright!
Havin' trouble keepin' up, ~name~?
And I didn't expect no less.
Take your time, now, ~name~. I'll be watchin' close.
Thanks, ~name~. I don't mind you losin' at all.
Outstandin'!
Great work! I wanted to see ~name~ lose.
Really pushin' to join me, ain't ya?
Y'alright, ~name~? You seem awful distracted.
Alright! This is my favorite part!
It's awful nice that I can still enjoy this after losin'.
Yay! ~Player~, it's your turn!
Thanks, ~player~! I'm learning lots about how not to play!
Well, don't mind if I do!
Why don't ya shave a bit more off hun'?
Now, what's this?
Poor li'l lamb ain't so helpless now, is she?
I'm sorry! But someone had to lose!
Hope y'all are still havin' fun, 'cause I sure am!
What do you mean, ~player~? What's behind me? I don't see nothin'...
We did it! Well... 'cept for ~name~, I s'pose.
Shoot, I didn't... no, hang on... I didn't lose?
Well ain't that a fine holstein!
Now this I don't mind at all!
Gorgeous, I say.
'Nother round, 'nother step closer to winnin'!
Shoulda had better if you thought you could take me down!
~Player~, this ain't funny! Is there somethin' back there or not?
Don't mind me, hon'. I won't make a peep.
Careful, now; can't keep losin' forever.
I ain't sayin' that this'll help me out, darlin'... but give us a nice show, hmm?
Wait just a... that can happen? What's goin' on here?
Hon'... y'all know you're already naked, right?
I don't mind stallin' now. I got all I could want right here.
Havin' fun, ~name~? Sure looks like some of you is, anyway.
You okay, ~name~? I think... maybe y'all didn't play this too smart.
What're you thinkin', ~name~?
Take your time; I ain't in no hurry.
Don't disappoint, now!
Aw, you're only goin' for that?
Go as slow as ya like, dear; I don't mind none.
Y'all can take all the time you want. I'll see all I want anyhow.
No, no, I see how it is. 'S the point of the game, and all...
Fine by me! Take all the time you need, dear.
Refreshin' to meet someone who knows what they want, darlin'!
~Clothing~ or no, I still see them family jewels!
Is it just me, or does ~name~ look better without his ~clothing~?
Now ain't that a cryin' shame.
Ain't no sweat, darlin'.
Now I know that ain't all you got, handsome.
Ain't nobody explained the point of this game to you?
Tell you what, you take somethin' bigger off next time, and I'll give you a fine show afterwards~
I'm not sure if you just don't understand modesty or what, but I guess you're still obeyin' the rules.
I ain't 'bout to forget that y'already got the goods on display, darlin'.
At least you're still playin'! Even though... y'ain't got no modesty left!
I bet I'd love it! Whatever it is you're takin' off!
So small! I could lose ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ in my wool!
Look at the bright side; ain't no wolf tryin' to take you from your flock.
Ooooh dangit!
Is it too late to change your mind?
Oh, yeah; this is the good part, ain't it?
How cute!
I love ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~! Ain't never had nothin' like ~clothing.ifPlural('em|that)~.
You're runnin' out of trinkets aren't you darlin'?
I shoulda planned this out some. Least Peggy gave me some advice.
Aww, now that's all you're giving us?
Hope you got somethin' nice to show us...
I'll always be happy to see someone else losin'!
Sure hope we'll be gettin' 'nother nice view soon...
Don't be stingy, now. Nobody likes a miser.
Gotta tell ya, ain't nothin' like a nice, strong hand strokin' me down, fingers combin' through my wool...
Gotta tell ya, ain't nothin' like a nice, strong hand strokin' me down, fingers combin' through my wool...
Ain't this about showin' some skin?
You sure are tryin' to draw this out, ain't ya?
Now that's just disappointin'.
C'mon, now; ain't you want nothin' I got?
What're you thinkin', ~name~?
Ain't no need to be sheepish, now.
Can ya show me somethin' nice, ~name~?
Now, somethin' just don't feel right...
Ooh... ~name~, I like your ~clothing~.
Now that ain't what I wanted!
That's all? Don't you want to take off anything else?
Well, fine. I guess that's a good idea.
How much longer you think you can stall, ~name~?
That ain't bad... but I bet it'll be better next time.
Now ain't this a surprise?
Ooh, I like winnin'!
Don't keep me waitin', now.
I wouldn't mind you shearin' off somethin' big.
Now that ain't half bad.
Did I tell y'all that I love this game?

state.text: Now you're... quite the looker, ain't you?

case.state: I could stay here all day! But c'mon, now, I wanna see some more!
Now I bet you're about to make me a happy sheep!
Oh, that's great! I'm doin' real well, ain't I?
This is so excitin'!
Oh, this is my favorite part!
I love it when ~name~ loses. Hope ya don't mind me sayin' that!
If ya don't wanna take somethin' off yourself, I know a wolf who can take it off from miles away.
~Name~? Doggone, sorry 'bout that darlin'.
I wonder if... maybe you'll be joinin' me soon...
Now I knew it!
You're gettin' me all a-titter, darlin'.
Now that's how you do it! I oughtta learn from you!

state.text: I... I think I know now what Peggy's always been gettin' at...

case.state: We're gettin' there, but that ain't no way enough for me.
Less is more, y'know. So why not give us some more?
Y'ain't out yet, right? You can do it!
Now it's about time!
I can't hardly wait to see this!
Now we're gettin' to the prime cuts, ain't we~?
Oh well would you look at that~?
Why don't you hurry up a bit darlin'? We're all waitin'!
Ohh, I'm in love, honey!
What a hunk!
Now I get why Peggy was so adamant about me comin' here!
You don't mind if this becomes a pettin' zoo for a sec', do ya hun?
Now hang on a sec', we're goin' awful fast here, ain't we?
Why don't you give us a good look under the hood, ~name~?
Sure looks like you're hidin' somethin' serious in there!
Lordy! Your ~clothing~ don't leave much to the imagination, now ~clothing.ifPlural(do they|does it)~?
Hurry an' show momma the goods, darlin'!

state.text: Oh, I can't wait to get my hands on this fine hunk o' meat~!

case.state: With a piece like that, I ain't sure what good your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ doin'.
It's so cute!
Hope you at least know how to handle that thing, ~player~.
Hold on, now... is that it?
Ain't much of a prize, now is it?
Darlin', you know my tail's bigger'n that, right?
Wait a second, now... I can't hardly... is that it?
I ain't tryin' to be mean, darlin', but I don't see nothin' but wool down there.
Ah, well, ain't that dissapointin'...
It's alright! It's a little chilly in here anyways...
They say the best things come in small packages, ya know.
Lookit you! I wouldn't mind a closer look, darlin'; I don't bite.
Now that's what I call a big reveal!
Y'know, just 'cause I'm a sheep don't mean I'll just fall for that look.
Ya need to borrow some shears? I don't mind none...
Guess I can't complain too much!
Heavens to Betsy! You could hurt a girl with a tool like that!
Talk about givin' a dog a bone!
Shoot, that thing almost hurts to look at!
Well doggone... you could give Barbra a run for her money, couldn't you?
It's like... some kinda bizarre tree!
Now ain't that a looker!
Now ain't you hung like a horse!
Oh, hold on, now... you're 'bout on your last leg.
I could get used to this, y'know.
Alright, hurry on up! I can't hardly wait!
Well shoot, I sure don't mind no company, standin' here like this.
I see what yer goin' for, ~name~! Come on, now, let 'em loose!
We 'bout to get a couple more girls out here?
Let your little lambs loose!
My girls're awful lonely out here, ~name~. You gonna help out with that?
Now look what's comin' down the bend!
Let 'em loose, ~name~! They're just beggin' to be let out!

state.text: Now that's just right, and I ain't hearin' no disagreement, y'hear?

case.state: We'll just call 'em "fun size", darlin'.
So cute! I ain't all that much different, darlin'!
It's alright now hon', they're more sensitive at that size!
Mine ain't too much bigger, hon'!
Don't you worry none; that's the perfect size, darlin'!
Now that's a classy chassis.
Careful now; flash those headlights the wrong way, you could cause a wreck!
Mind if I take a little milk back to the farm?
Aw, you are a bit bigger, ain't ya? Guess ya got me there.
You're doin' fine, ~name~. Don't you cover up, now!
My heavens! You'd turn the cows back home green with envy!
Well I'll be. I didn't think anyone could compete with Barbra!
You'd win awards for udders that big!
You're comin' back with me! We're winnin' that blue ribbon.
Tell me the secret, will ya? I've been tryin' to get these puppies to grow for years!
You're already showin' off the garden?
Ahh! I'm doin' so good! I wish Peggy could see me now; I'd wipe that smirk right off her face!
Oh! I wasn't expectin' that!
Well don't be shy, now; you already lost.
Now I bet you're just the cutest thing up under there~
I bet you're as good as done!
I guess ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ must be more annoyin' than I'd thought.
Well... this game just keeps gettin' better, don't it?
It ain't so bad, right? I'd know; ain't never worn pants in my life.
Now how'd...? Ain't no shears cuttin' that close!
Heavens to Betsy! Darlin', you need to borrow my shears for a minute?
Oh, this game's a trip!
Whenever y'all are finished droolin'; she ain't out yet.
What in the world's...?
Serves you right!
Wait a second, you're the one who...
Not again!
Don't you dare!
Transformations? What're you talkin' about?
Now look at that outfit! You 'bout ready for a war, darlin'?
I thought you said you were good at games.
So what do you do besides play games?
Ain't you just the cutest li'l thing.
Did it again! And at least y'ain't gotta show too much, right Emi?
Oooh... I been meanin' to ask; where'd you even get an outfit like that?
You alright, darlin'?
Guess nobody else is goin' easy on ya either.
Aww, Haru lost? I sure didn't wanna lose, but I didn't want this neither!
Hmm... Maybe this ain't so bad, y'know?
Now that's some gorgeous hair.
I ain't sure what to make of you, miss Jura.
That get-up wouldn't do ya no good on the farm.

state.text: I'm thinkin' you might've forgotten somethin'. Not that I mind none~

case.state: Yeah! Just what I was hopin' for!
What in the world's all that? You look 'bout ready to join a parade!
Whole lotta good all that kit's doin' ya now, huh?
Guess that staff wasn't holdin' you back after all.
Oh, them gloves! Sure wish they made pretty things like that for hooves.
I gotta say, you've got my interest. Whatchya thinkin', Mr. Marth?
Thanks for them boots earlier, but Mae I have somethin' else?
What're you? Ain't never seen no get-up like that!
I guess that outfit wasn't what was makin' ya lose, now was it?
Don't think I didn't notice you floatin' 'round like a woman possessed!
What on Earth are you wearin'?
You sayin' you're from space? Like, outer space?
I heard what you're after, here.
What's that yer drinkin', anyway? I'm a bit parched.
Poor dear... just like a little lamb, ain't ya?
Ain't no sweat, darlin'.
You look awful young to be here, darlin'. This ain't no pettin' zoo.
Ya don't need to stay, darlin'...
Now just look at all that hair! It's gorgeous!
I don't know if you are somethin' special, but you sure are losin' like anyone else.
Oh, I oughtta keep an eye on you, Pinkie. I bet I could learn somethin' smart.
So... hang on, now... you ain't a bird?
I'm sure you're not done yet, Mr. Angel!
Say, Mr. Angel? Can I ask you for somethin'?
Somethin' wrong, Mr. Angel? Maybe it ain't my place to say, but you sure seem to be losin' a lot...
Somebody's hotter'n a herd of bulls in the summer sun!
Gosh I sure hope we didn't get off on the wrong foot.
I think maybe I know what's eatin' ya.
Sorry 'bout that, darlin'.
Lookit you! I've seen oxen less well-built!
Yay! Is it rude if I say I's hopin' you'd lose?
What a tall glass of water!
I love it!
Now when we gettin' somethin' more impressive, darlin'?
Ya sure do talk big, darlin'.
Hang on, now... you're not human either?
This game seems so unfair sometimes...
Now that's a right pretty dress! I sure wish my wool could shine like that.
All that fancy clothin' ain't doin' ya much good in poker, now is it?
I don't mind seein' a bit more underwear. That's why we're still playin', right?
You are good at this game!
Y'alright there, Nats? Someone should'a told us the rules!
Y'all okay over there? Lordy, you're worse than a cat in heat!
You... wanna lose? Ain't there better places to just do that? Why even play the game?
I can't hardly enjoy winnin' if y'all want to lose.
Well, what's wrong, Nats? We're just here to have some fun!
Alright, alright, don't rub it in. I had a first loss too y'know.
And we have ourselves a winner!
Haha! I'd hoped I could do it!
Eee! Oh, this is fun!
I like this game!
I did great, didn't I?
Ain't no harm in a li'l old win like that!
Oh, all this looks so confusin'... How does anyone keep up with it?
Gosh, we can't turn down the heat at all?
I oughtta stay a bit after we're done here. Been meanin' to get some book learnin' done.
Y'all mind if I have a quick dip? I won't take long!
Anyone else thinkin' what I'm thinkin'? At least it'll be easy enough to clean up later on...
Y'all know why we got so many guests? When did they get here?
Hey, now, why's everyone look so excited? What's goin' on?
About time someone finally joined me.
Whatchya thinkin', ~name~?
Aww, I was rootin' for ya.
Haha! Sorry, ~name~, but I was hopin' you'd lose this one!
Someone had to lose the round. Ain't like it coulda been me!
Ain't right, I tell ya. Startin' a game like this when we ain't even sure what's goin' on.
Shoot!
N-no! I ain't for dinner, y'hear! Don't talk like that!
I know! They just look so miserable... finally, someone gets it!
Stop, stop, stop!
What're you doin'?! Cut that out!
My ears! Make it stop!
This ain't what I wanted!
I ain't never seen nothin' like that...
You wearin'... leaves? Guess I can't talk much about strange clothin', but...
Lots of work keepin' them shoes nice and pretty, ain't it darlin'?

state.text: Guess I shouldn't be too surprised... Been seein' all kinds of strange sorts here.

case.state: Maybe I ain't got nothin' to worry 'bout after all.
I... mostly just keep an eye out for wolves.
Now what on Earth is all that supposed to be? You look like the tin man, hon'!
You're just the cutest li'l thing!
Wait a sec, ain't you got socks you could...?
Hang on now... why ain't you...?
What in the world...? You...
Now I... I don't wear no clothes like that, but...
Y'all seem awful nice for this sorta game...
Well... I ain't about to go easy on you, ya hear?
Don't you worry none, darlin'.
You just look so... comfy! Y'almost remind me of Barbra!

state.text: But Barbra's got the warmest, softest hugs y'ever did feel... Like gettin' lost in a cloud.

case.state: What's all... you just come from some kinda war or somethin'?
Hang on, that counts? It ain't even clothin'!
Y' don't seem so bad though. Y'almost remind me of Barbra.
...but it sure helps you out here. How much you wearin', anyhow?
Whaddaya say 'bout a hug, darlin'? I don't bite.
Oh, and here I thought it couldn't get no better.
Talk about impractical; them nice shiny boots'd be 'bout pretty as a pig once they're covered in mud.
Wait now, don't do nothin' hasty!
Ooh... I like them boots. Wouldn't stay so pretty steppin' through mud, though.
Doin' alright, there, princess? You seem awful antsy.
Hang on a sec'...
Now those boots look nice 'n practical.
I know y'ain't got no much of a choice, just lemme poke my fun!
Well, whatever y'are, you're not unstoppable.
Whoa! What's goin' on here?
I guess y'ain't so bad. When you're not dressin' up for Halloween.
Wait... them teeth... I know I've seen this before! I ain't your dinner!
Sure does make you look nice!
I heard stories about the cows gettin' took by space aliens, y'know...
You're lookin' for a bo'!
Ooh! Give it here, give it here!
Oh, so that's what I's smellin'.
But you ain't leavin'?
I oughtta warn you now: I ain't gonna settle for halfway done.
No I don't make it a pettin' zoo wherever I go!
You 'n ~player~ can get outta here whever ya want. I won't mind none.
What cute shoes!
Gotta say, Nugi, I ain't too sure what you... are.
It's absolutely glowing!
But that don't matter none. Angel or not, I still think you're fine.
You're on a race to the bottom, ain't ya? Startin' with your top?
I shoulda known! I bet Pinkie's the one what's playin' this right.
Wait... you're actually kickin' off them shoes? I don't...
Oh, I get it! You're like an angel or somethin'!
I ain't too sure why you're here... doin'... this...
I don't ever know what kinda trouble Peggy's tryin' to get me into, or why them wolves're always so nasty... I know you angels probably see all that stuff...
Oh, I just got the best idea! Once we're done here!
Y'all still havin' fun? The game ain't no fun with sore losers.
I ain't scared by no guns; Droopy can shoot with the best of 'em.
You ain't too used to seein' sheep, are ya?
Hang on, now; guns count as clothin'?
Nothin' too big for yer first loss, but...
Aww, now that's no fun!
What brings y'all here... Ryuji, ya say?
I ain't sayin' I hope you lose, sugar...
Aww, now is that really all? You gonna make me beg?
I like your uniform. Where you from?
But I don't think I got much to worry 'bout, now do I?
What? What's goin' on?
Ah! How'd you do that? That ain't natural!
Why're you goin' right for your top?
Wait now, I don't know if...
Ooh, it's shiny...
That get-up looks mighty chilly, miss Weiss.
Seein' boots like that sure makes me wish I could wear shoes.
Hang on, now... that didn't take long at all!
Oh! Well ain't this a surprise?
I guess y'ain't doin' too bad.
I oughtta learn how you play. Is there a trick you can give me?
I bet you can win this!
Ooh! Them ears! You from a farm too?
Perfect! I was hopin' to meet someone else like me here!
Hang on a sec... now that looks just like my... ~name~, we're like twins, ain't we?
Oh, I always loved music. Mind playin' us somethin'?
You play music? I'd love to hear some!
Why don't you play us a tune, ~name~?
You steal things, don't ya, ~name~? Well don't you get no ideas, y'hear?
Now you wouldn't have no reason to kidnap a poor li'l helpless sheep, would you ~name~?
(I wonder how that happened. It's rude to ask though, ain't it?)
Don't be such a damp rag, ~name~. You're playin' strip poker with a sheep; lighten up!
Ah! Ghost! Don't hurt me, miss ~name~!
Wait, we can get help? Where's Peggy when ya need her?
Oh! I get it now! It ain't just about bettin' small stuff, is it?
Why're you givin' up more...? Oh! It ain't about the clothing, is it?
C'mon, now; ante up!
Alright, now; pay up! Ain't no gamble without stakes.
Hand it over, now. You don't wanna see a sheep refused what she's earned.
It's just so excitin'. I can't help myself!
Whatchu got for us, darlin'?
Wait a sec... you're glowy all over! Are you... are you both some kinda angel?
But if he's an angel, then what's that make you?
Ain't no need to be a sourpuss.

state.text: Ain't no need to be a sourpuss.

case.state: Matter of fact... you're all glowy! You some kinda angel?
Like, a horse? Well, sure, I wouldn't mind meetin' 'em. Bet they got somethin' interestin' to say about you.
Now we know, let's kick their butts!
Y'all alright? Hello? Nayru?
That dang wolf always tries to eat us; I thought I'd be safe from that here.
What in the world's gotten into you?!
I oughtta... why, if Barbra were here, you'd get it right proper!
Don't do that again!
You're lucky I didn't have to pee!
I'm in way over my head here...
Sure is creative, I'll say that!
Oh? What's goin' on?
I guess most ain't blessed with hooves, now are they?
But don't let me stop you from droppin' a sword!
Maybe we can see after the game.
Ain't like I really gotta; Droopy's got a keen eye.
Oh, yeah; never mind. Awful loud hat, ain't it?
What's a little thing like you even doin' in a place like this, anyhow?
Must be you just know somethin' I don't.
Golly, I don't get this game none, do I?
Y'ain't had to go an' do that, darlin'.
That don't mean a lamb can't feel pretty every now and again!
I guess if what you want's to come outta your shell, this'll do the trick.
Ain't like it makes you any worse at the game, now is it?
You're a real cutie, y'hear?
Barbra's like a big sister. Tall, grows wool even faster'n I do. Everyone seems afraid of her for some reason.
Huggin' ain't against no rules, right? I still ain't too used to most'a y'all's games.
Well, as long as I ain't in yer sights, I don't got no problems with that.
I ain't sayin' I want you to keep that sword at yer side...
You should meet her! She'd love you, I just know it!
Maybe next time I oughtta come to you for tips; you sure seem to know more than Peggy ever did.
Doesn't do much good to stall with little things when the goods're already out there.
Why not come a little closer'n see how soft this wool really is?
I'm sure it'll be waitin' nice and pretty for ya whenever you're done.
If you need somethin' to stroke, this wool's just as soft as it looks.
Oh, I see plenty. Let's see another round, princess.
Whenever you're ready, your highness.
You're a woman? Doggone ya had me fooled!
Glad someone's bein' sensible 'bout their footwear.
Ain't no need to be a sourpuss.
Even if ya do talk like you've gone bonkers.
Ya are a normal gal! Oh, I knew it all along. Sheep got an eye for this kinda thing, y'know.
Oh, wait... is it Halloween? Did I miss it?
Right? You wouldn't hurt an innocent li'l lamb, now would ya?
Even if it does look mighty chilly. You alright for winter in that?
If you try to take me, Droopy'll hound you till you quit! I mean it!
You wouldn't kidnap a poor, helpless li'l lamb, now would you?
And darlin', your search is gonna be a short one, let me tell ya!
Hey, my head's clean! Ain't no sheep on the farm with cleaner wool!
Might be easier to win if ya weren't drinkin' somethin' so foul.
Well shoot. C'mon, then, show us what you've got!
You got the heart to see this through, and I'm fittin' to make sure you do!
I... I ain't sayin' I don't want no pets, but...
Unless there might be... somethin' keepin ya here...
Sometimes I sure wish they made shoes for sheep.
Well, human, sure; I seen them plenty. Just never seen no one like you 'round the farm.
Ooh, why do I just wanna give you a hug so badly?
Oh, don't mind me none. You seem like you've done this before.
And it ain't so bad to watch, if ya don't mind my sayin'.
I just can't keep up, Pinkie. Is it better to strip quick or no?
I never thought I'd see the day! Anything you want, Mr. Angel, just gimme a holler!
But I'm rootin' for ya!
You think y'all can teach me some'a them things? I'll be a good li'l lamb, honest!
You should come back to the farm with me a minute! Oh, Barbra'd love to meet you! And we could teach Peggy a thing or two, I know it.
Oh Barbara would just have the darndest time with you, Mr. Angel!
Peggy would love you Mr. Angel! I oughtta introduce you!
I didn't mean nothin' by it!
I just ain't too used to... you!
That's just fine. I like you! You'll get used to it in no time!
Sometimes I feel like these rules're just made up as we're goin' along.
I dunno, there's just somethin' about some nice, strong hands...
Oh, it's fine, it's fine. Guess we'll just have to keep wearin' you down the ol' fashioned way!
Ya sure are makin' me burn up, Rinkah.
Oh, this is gonna be a good game!
I just don't mind when ya do!
Well I ain't gonna beg. I'll just have to hope you keep on losin'.
Cute li'l schoolgirls used to come by the farm every now and again; you remind me of 'em, is all.
Let's see how this turns out, darlin'.
I don't... I ain't sure what you're talkin' about. I don't mind blue skin none though. Why hide that?
You okay? How'd... how're you still on your feet? I mean I've seen chickens what could still stand for a bit, but...
Ahh! Oh, I didn't expect to find another animal here! What're you? A horse?
You're awful eager to get outta them clothes, now. And I'm mighty glad I don't need to wear nothin' like that.
Seems like it could use a bit of wool in it. Oh, don't worry none; doesn't hurt me to lose a bit.
Hooves ain't too bad, but they're awful hard to doll up.
Oh, I get it. Yeah, I bet Peggy'd like you.
Y'all startin' to grow on me, too.
Still plenty of time to lose, though.
I'll be rootin' for ya!
I dunno, there's just somethin' about some nice, strong hands...
Oh! I get it; this ain't like no other game I've played.
Don't you wanna save the good bits for last, hon'?
I think I've seen people 'round the farm wearin' stuff like that, but never so fancy!
Your ~clothing~ wouldn't last too long back on the farm.
I sure would like a closer look...
Alright, alright, no sense floggin' a dead horse. We've got poker to play!
You'll be out 'fore ya know it!
I'm excited to see what you'll do when you lose again.
Ooh, could I try holdin' your ~clothing~? I'll give ~clothing.ifPlural('em|it)~ back in a jiffy!
Game's just as fun without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|that)~ ~clothing~, darlin'!
Here I thought this whole time none a'y'all had money.
'S more about what's underneath...
Wait a sec, now where you -- ooh! What's that?
Was it somethin' we said?
You know I ain't 'bout to take my eyes off you, dear.
Oh! I uhh... thought I'd be better at tellin' that sorta thing.
Mm-hmm... That's a fine piece of man if ever I've seen it.
Now what on Earth? You're puttin that up in...?
Y'all humans sure get into some weird things, don't you?
I hear Pinkie goin' nuts over there, but I just can't stand the thought of doin' that!
I'm not even sure if I want to win like this...
Gosh, y'all sure I can't join in?
Sure is awful lonesome up here...
This... sure is somethin'...
I'm sure one of y'all's a fan of a sight like this.
Is the game over yet?
This is sure excitin', but... I've got somewhere to be, y'know?
I better get on outta here. Least I ain't got much to grab on the way out.
Wait just a... there wasn't even no...
That's all, ~name~? Guess you're a bit... touchy, ain't ya?
You must be awful new to this. Don't worry none, darlin'; long as you had fun.
Lordy! I was 'bout thinkin' you were never gonna stop!
'Bout time! I think the cows came home while you were busy!
Y'ain't got nothin' else to lose, ~name~. But... I'm sure you'll think of somethin'.
Winnin's nice. Thanks for really showin' me, ~name~.
Finally! I been waitin' to see you use that thing!
About time. I won't ever pass up a chance to catch this up close.
Alright, ~name~; git down here.
Now what're you still doin' way up there? You lost, didn't you?
Wish it coulda happened sooner, but you played too good, ~name~.
You're good, ~name~... but y'ain't good enough!
Now show me how it's done!
Oh, don't go bein' bashful now. We've already seen what you're workin' with, so get workin'!
I guess I can't give you a hand, but... ah! I might think of somethin'~
Perfect!
Now that's what I'm talkin' about.
Ooh, cool! You know not to keep a gal waitin', don't you?
Alright! Don't hold back, now; just 'cause I'm out don't mean I'm blind!
Tell ya what; gimme a good show and I'll return the favor, darlin'.
I could get used to a show like this, ~name~.
I think I got a date.
I can dig it, ~name~. Ya got spunk!
I don't mind this view none.
This sure is better'n anything on the farm...
Would it help if I told ya to bleat that meat?
Keep it up! I'm lovin' every second, darlin'!
Sure wish I had some good, strong hands like that strokin' my wool...
You... sure know how to work it, don't ya...
Don't you worry none; ain't no Earthly woman could possibly ignore you for long, ~name~.
Hey, now; at least y'ain't givin' up. Almost makes me wanna give ya a hand~
Doin' yer best, ~name~! I gotta say, I like that in a man~
Y'ain't so bad, ~name~.
Say, ~name~, you do any dirty talkin'? I never was no good at it.
Oh, ~name~! I can't hardly look in your direction while yer doin' that!
What do you think, ~name~? Ain't nothin' wrong with havin' some fun, we already done lost.
I can't hardly tear myself away, ~name~...
Any ideas? There must be some way to help out...
I'm used to watchin' grass grow, dear; I could stand here all day.
I can't get upset at your stares, ~name~. Good Lord knows I was starin' right back.
I was supposed to be done, ~name~... Y'all makin' me wanna go again.
Really goin' at it, ain't ya?
Not uhh... Ahem! Not bad.
Now that's a tall glass of somethin'!
Ooh, it gets everywhere! That wouldn't never come outta wool, you know that?
Eep!
Come a bit closer why don't you, ~name~?
Now I could use some of that milk, ~name~...
Aw, I was hopin' we'd... oh, never mind.
Leggy likes~
Is that all you're givin' me? I'll keep goin', but just 'cause you're as cute as y'are.
What a man!
You should'a told me, I'd have... I... uhh...
I like your spunk, ~name~!
Alright! I just keep on winnin'!
Ha! Did it again!
Ya lost, ~name~. And it sure don't look like you've got nothin' else for us to take.
Y'all just can't catch a break, now can you?
Right now'd be a pretty good time to have some wool, don't ya think?
I don't see no more clothes... but I still got them shears, if ya need 'em!
Now just what is it that happens next again? Doggone, just seems to slip my mind every time.
Y'all better not try nothin' funny, now... I'll be watchin' ya closely.
Ooh... Ain't that somethin'?
Now I ain't sayin' you're late, ~name~, but I would'a been fine with you losin' just a bit sooner.
Game's over for you, ~name~. But it ain't so bad, standin' here.
I don't gotta leave yet, right? I get the feelin' somethin' nice is about to happen.
Git on down there and show us how it's done!
Teach me a lesson, ~name~; I'll pay close attention!
You can do this, ~name~! Better'n me, anyway!
You don't mind if I watch now do ya? I ain't had that much experience with these hands...
Alright, now, ~name~. Show me how it's done.
I ain't got nothin' better to stare at, ~name~. Just so ya know.
Then again... maybe I could get used to this...
This ain't somethin' I'm used to, y'know!
Yeah, I'll watch... up here. All by my lonesome.
You can do this, ~name~! Just pretend we're not here!
Have fun, now, ~name~! Ain't much of a game otherwise!
That ain't half bad...
Aw, I shouldn't be enjoyin' this so much...
Well ain't somebody havin' fun over there?
~Name~ just looks so... don't y'all think we oughtta help her?
You sure you don't want the shears, ~name~? They won't hurt none!
Take your time, ~name~. Don't hurt yourself now.
Y'already lost, ~name~. No sense in beating yourself up.
At least ~name~ is havin' fun!
Oh... y'need some help, ~name~? I... wouldn't mind none.
I ain't starin'. I'm just... learnin'.
I can dig it, ~name~!
Maybe the mood's jus' gettin' to me, but... gosh, you sure look nice tonight, ~name~.
I'm in heaven, darlin'!
At least someone knows what she's doin'.
Y'all havin' fun over there?
Was I so loud? How embarrassin'.
I shoulda tried that!
Inside voice, now, dear.
I don't want to go again, ~name~, but... y'all makin' it tough.
I oughtta get back to the farm sometime. Last time Barbra heard I took Peggy's advice, she 'bout tore my ear off gettin' me home.
I oughtta come back sometime. This place is nice.
Hang on a sec, how long we been here? If Barbra thinks somethin's wrong, I'll never hear the end of it.
Lookin' slick, ~name~.
You 'bout done yet, Akko? Or you goin' for some kinda record?
Now lookit Ol' Faithful over there!
You make that look fun.
Well shoot, now I almost can't wait to join ya.
You come here often, ~name~?
N-now... I ain't sayin' I want to join her or nothin', but... she sure made that mess look fun.
Ooh... I'm 'bout ready to join in on the fun over here.
Hold on now, I wasn't ready!
Mmh! I'm gettin' all tingly...
Ooh! I ain't never felt that before!
I wasn't nothin' like that, now was I?
Ends just a bit too soon, don't it, ~name~?
I think y'all did great, ~name~.
Alright, alright, I hear ya... At least I've got somethin' to look at meanwhile...
Aww, now that wasn't a good game for me, was it? Nah, don't worry none 'bout me... I think I can do this.
Hmph! It's just a tick, y'hear? I can't help the occasional bleat...
Another loss? Well shoot, I don't got no more wool... guess I don't got no choice but to join the fun.
I ain't too happy 'bout losin', but... I don't mind this none.
Here goes nothin'. I ain't too used to doin' this just yet...
Hunh~! Oh, my stars!
I'll tell ya, I could get used to this.
Everything's just feelin' so... good!
This ain't half bad.
Oh, don't be sheepish, hon! I came here to have fun!
Bet you're just havin' a dog of a time up there, ain't you?
Enjoy your victory all you'd like, darlin'. You've earned it.
What's our winner here thinkin'? I bet I got an idea...
Can't believe Peggy'd send me here without even tellin' me nothin'.
This ain't all bad. Even if I was the first one out.
Sheep really ain't no good at cards, huh?
I don't mind bein' down here all by my lonesome, y'all.
Ah! What was that? Is there a bug down here?
Mmm... Now that ain't too bad a sight, is it?
Peggy... You knew this'd happen, didn't you?
Least I got somethin' to look at.
Golly, you are a looker, ain't ya?
Ba! Nn-- D-don't say nothin'! Hard to focus when things like all this ha-a-apen!
Ba-a... D-dang it, Nugi... y'all got it on my mind, now I can't stop!
Oh, it ain't so bad, havin' company...
Harder to focus when you're not alone, ain't it?
Oh, gracious, I think I'm...!
Ain't gonna be l-long now...!
Ah! S-so... warm!
Ah! Oh, darlin'...
Just... just...! Ahh! Hah... Now that's somethin'...
I... I can? What's that mean?
This ain't the sorta game you want to lose early, is it?
Oh, I like this. Don't even got to worry 'bout no cards!
(Yawn) I'm 'bout ready to hit the hay...
Aww, shoot. Guess I didn't think this through none, now did I?
Tonight's s'posed to be chilly, ain't it? Rats.
This place ain't so bad. I guess.
Y'enjoyin' the show, ~player~?
I gotta say, ~player~... I was hopin' you wouldn't win this one...
You can pick your jaw up off the ground whenever you'd like, ~player~.
Why do I gotta stay 'till everyone's done?
Now this is just torture. Just makin' me watch.
Talk to the tail, sugar.
This is sure draggin' on.
Ah~! Wonder if Barbra'd mind stayin' with me tonight.
Whatchya think's gonna happen next?
C'mon, hurry up! Nothin's even happenin' right now!
Guess I don't really gotta pay much attention to the game, now do I?
Y'know... one of you ain't leavin' this round as decked out as you started it.
Alright, y'all, place your bets!
Who y'all think's gonna win?
Oh, this is so excitin'! Wonder which of y'all I'm gonna get to see more of!
C'mon, ~player~! Show 'em what's what!
I'd say I was rootin' for ya, ~player~, but I wouldn't wanna lie, would I?
I think I know who I'd rather see lose next. ~Player~, throw a dog a bone, would ya?
Oh, I still have clothes on! I must be good at this!
Well shoot, y'all couldn't get any of this wool off me? I'm still gonna need a shearin' y'know!
Not a bad show~! I didn't learn nothin' 'bout poker from y'all though!
I did it! I even had some wool to spare, huh?
Now that was... somethin'. Do we gotta part ways now?
What do you mean "I won"? I missed all the fun!
Wait, that's it? I don't get to join y'all?
Aww, I can't play again without my wool, can I?
Oh heeey, Barbra... when did you get here?
Leggy. ~Player~. Call me Barbra. I'm a... friend. She didn't get into no trouble, right?
I oughtta tan Peggy's hide tonight. C'mon, let's get you home, dear.
How smart! How'd you do that? With the flowers? You've got to teach me! Please?
